#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;

main()
{
	int t;
	
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		char s[1001]={0},x[1001]={0};
		cin>>s;
	    cin>>x;
	    
	    int arr[10000]={0},j=0,k=0,i,l;
	    int ls = strlen(s);
	    int lx = strlen(x);
		 
		 
	    for(i=0;i<ls;i++)
	     {
	     	 if(x[0]==s[i])
	     	 {
	     	 	arr[j]=i;
	     	 	++j;
	     	 }
	      }
	       for(i=1;i<lx;i++)
	     {
	     	l=0;
	     	for(k=0;k<j;k++)
	     	{
	     	 
	     	 if(x[i]==s[arr[k]+1])
	     	 {
	     	 	arr[l]=arr[k]+1;
	     	 	++l;
	     	 }
	       }
	       j=l;
	    }
	    int start[1000]={0};
	    char str[1000]={0};
	    for(int p=0;p<j;p++)
	      {
	      	start[p]=arr[p]-lx+1;
	        //cout<<start[p]<<endl;
	      }
	      int q=0,m=0;
	      start[j]=ls;
		 for(int r=0;r<j+1;r++)
		  {
		  	 
		     	while(m!=start[r])
		     	 {
		     	 	str[q]=s[m];
		     	   ++q;
		     	   ++m;
				  }
		     	
		     	 
		     	 	m = m + lx;
		     	 
		     	 
		     
		  }
		  if(q==0)
		  printf("0\n");
		  
		  else
		  cout<<str<<endl;
		 
	}
	
	return 0;
}
